org.kepler.stratosphere.io.input

Class TokenInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.api.common.io.GenericInputFormat<eu.stratosphere.types.Record>
      • eu.stratosphere.api.java.record.io.GenericInputFormat
        • org.kepler.stratosphere.io.input.TokenInputFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    eu.stratosphere.api.common.io.InputFormat<eu.stratosphere.types.Record,eu.stratosphere.core.io.GenericInputSplit>, java.io.Serializable

    public class TokenInputFormat
extends eu.stratosphere.api.java.record.io.GenericInputFormat
    An input format for Ptolemy tokens. FIXME: only supports array of strings tokens.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl
    See Also:

      • open

        public void open(eu.stratosphere.core.io.GenericInputSplit split)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Opens a parallel instance of the input format to work on a split.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        Specified by:
